content: p1 k3 to last 3 st p1 k2 cut cc1 mc r3 4 5 k1 sl1 k3 to last 3 st sl1 k2 mc r6 7 knit cc2 r8 knit cc2 r9 k3 p1 k3 to last st p1 cut cc2 mc r10 11 12 k3 sl1 k3 to last st sl1 mc r13 14 knit cc3 r15 16 repeat r1 and r2 cut cc3 mc r17-19 repeat r3-5 your beautiful knit socks will last much longer if you next round knit hand wash them using a after these stripes your sock should measures approx 1¾ no rinse wool wash and inches or 4½ cm less than your total foot length if you need lay flat to dry ♥ to knit further to get to this measurement please do so © tracie millar 2019 ~ on the porch ~ for personal use only 3 abbreviations bor beginning of round r round cc contrast colour rs right side co cast on sl slip_stitch as if to purl k knit with yarn at back ktbl knit through the back loop sm slip marker k2tog knit two stitches together ssk slip the next stitch knit wise mc main colour place the twisted stitch back on n1 needle one the lefthand needle and knit these two n2 needle two stitches together through their back p purl loops pm place marker ws wrong side pu pick up magic loop instruction video kitchener stitch instruction video https //youtu be/1mqiqrdjc68 https //youtu be/pjfri-_eqea these socks will always remind me of a very special trip to michigan in july 2019 there were many hours spent having amazing conversations with friends knitting on the porch of an adorable farmhouse we were staying at we were soaking up every minute together on the porch are a play on the simplicity of bold modern accent stripes in a classic stockinette sock the pattern is delightfully uncomplicated so you can knit it wherever you may be and using up tiny bits of treasured yarns if you ve always wanted to try a pair this is fantastic for your first venture into hand knit socks ♡ ♡ ♡ happy knitting friends tracie x thank you so much for your support ♥ knit please direct all pattern support questions to knitsleeprepeatdesigns@gmail com sleep find me on instagram @just_tracie ravelry tracieknits repeat #ontheporchsocks #knitsleeprepeatdesigns © tracie millar 2019 ~ on the porch ~ for personal use only 4
